Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board

Class AbstractBoard

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.AbstractBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircleBoard, RectangleBoard, TriangleBoard
public abstract class AbstractBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Represents the game board in which card can be added to a given position
See Also:
It is abstract because a board exists in different shape

    AbstractBoard()

  • Method Details

    • accept

      public abstract int accept​(IBoardVisitor board, Card victoryCard)
      Visitor accepts implementation in order to proceed score calculation for a round and a player.
      Parameters:
      board - the visitor
      victoryCard - The victory card associated with the score

    • isCardAdjacent

      public abstract boolean isCardAdjacent​(Coordinates coordinates)
      Check if the card is adjacent to an existing card on the board.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates of the new card
      Returns:
      if a card is adjacent to an existing card.

    • isCardInTheLayout

      public abstract boolean isCardInTheLayout​(Coordinates coordinates)
      Check if the given coordinates are in the board layout Returns false if a card exists at the given position
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates of the new card
      Returns:
      if coordinates are in the board layout and the given position is not occupied by a card.

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(Coordinates coordinates, Card newCard)
      This method have to be called after the "isCardAdjacent" and/or "isCardInTheLayout" methods.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the position where the card will be placed
      newCard - the card which we be placed

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard​(Coordinates oldCoordinates, Card oldCard)
      Removes a given coordinate and card from the board
      Parameters:
      oldCoordinates - the position of the card to remove
      oldCard - the card to remove

    • display

      public abstract void display()
      Displays every card of board in a text based format

    • getPlacedCards

      public java.util.Map<Coordinates,​Card> getPlacedCards()
      Returns a map containing every card that have been placed on the board
      Returns:
      placed card

    • clone

      public java.lang.Object clone() throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      Overrides:
      clone in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a clean copy of the AbstractBoard with a copy of the placed cards
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if board can not be cloned
